webscript.description:
Upload file content and meta-data into repository.
HTML form data
  • filedata, (mandatory) HTML type file
  • siteid
  • containerid
  • uploaddirectory
  • updatenoderef
  • filename
  • description
  • contenttype
  • majorversion
  • overwrite
  • thumbnails
  • revision
  • title
  • status
  • summaryText
  • fileauthor
  • filecreateddate
  • titlename
  • softSolutionFlag
  • convert

Return content
  • nodeRef

Return status: STATUS_OK (200)
